case_title: P. C. DWADESH SHRENI & Co. LTD. vs INCOME-TAX OFFICER, A-WARD, ALIGARH
appellant: P. C. DWADESH SHRENI & Co. LTD.

key_points.issue_1: Whether interest was liable to be paid under Section 18-A(8) of the Income-tax Act, 1922.
key_points.issue_2: Whether a separate order determining interest was required under Section 18-A(8).

judgment_summary.finding_1: The court held that partial non-payment of advance income-tax falls under the scope of 'no payment' as per Section 18-A(8).
judgment_summary.finding_2: The court ruled that no separate order awarding interest is required under Section 18-A(8); interest is automatically added to the tax determined during regular assessment.

cited_cases.case_name: Gursahai Saigal v. Commissioner of Income-tax
